field.email_format: [PL] This field has to be a valid email

label.motivation: [PL] Why do you want to sit?
label.sitters: [PL] Look for a perfect sitter for your pet

sitter.motivation: [PL] Why do you want to sit?

sitters.title: [PL] Find your pets' favourite sitter in just a view clicks
sitters.description: [PL] A community of pet sitters keeping pets happy while you cannot take care of them.

community.title: [PL] Our pet loving community
community.description: [PL] All pet sitters & owners gathered in one place to make pets happy and their owners satisfied

main_page.title: [PL] Pet sitting with love and experience
main_page.description: [PL] Book a free verified and reviewed pet sitter from our pet-loving community, or find a pet to sit

register.title: [PL] Register form
register.description: [PL] Please fill in required fields to create your account

email_verification.title: [PL] Email verification
email_verification.description: [PL] Congratulations! Your email has been verified. You will be redirected to login page in {{val}} seconds.

become_petsitter.title: [PL] Become a pet sitter
become_petsitter.description: [PL] You are just a few steps away from becoming a pet sitter. Please fill in all required fields to join PetPal community

experience.title: [PL] Pet sitting experience
experience.description: [PL] Describe your experience with animals, why do you want to be a pet sitter, and what animals would you like to sit

availability.title: [PL] Availability
availability.description: [PL] Please fill in your availability to help potential pet owners in making the right plans

summary.title: [PL] Pet sitter form summary
summary.description: [PL] Please check if everything is just like you want it to be

contact.title: [PL] Contact info
contact.description: [PL] Fill up your contact details to make it easier for a potencial sitter or pet owner to contact you. Only LOGGED user can view this data.

email_verification.success: [PL] Registration completed successfully! You can now login using provided credentials

access.not_logged_in: [PL] Access denied. Please log in to enter this page
access.logged_in: [PL] Access denied. You cannot enter this page while logged in

profile_pic.success: [PL] Profile picture has been updated successfully

login.success: [PL] You have been logged in successfully

create.fail: [PL] You cannot add review to this user

create.success: [PL] Sitter ad has been added successfully
create.fail: [PL] Something went wrong while adding a sitter ad, please check if you don't already own an advert
